item.title: Lab-建立Metasploitable 滲透練習Lab
item.author: Author
item.description: Kali Linux 下載位置 https://www.kali.org/downloads/ username root and password toor 登入後開啟終端機更新 #apt-get update #apt-get dist-upgrade #updatedb Metasploitable 下載位置 https://sourceforge.net/projects/metasploitable/ 下載後用VirtualBox匯入映象檔，以下面帳密使用 username msfadmin and password msfadmin Windows 10 VM https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-edge/tools/vms/ 可下載來進行測試 offensive security 說明 https://www.offensive-security.com/metasploit-unleashed/requirements/ 延伸閱讀 [轉]lonelysec-OSCP心得分享 練習網站
